main event: On 24 Sep 52, a B-29 aircraft crew observed bright, metallic-appearing particles while flying south of Charleston, West Virginia.
interesting points: Particles were seen at an altitude of 19,000 feet by crew members,Particles appeared as bright white light and varied in length,There was no sound associated with the phenomenon,The phenomenon was observed for approximately 10 to 13 miles from the point of first observation,Investigations concluded that the particles were not identifiable nor were they ice crystals.
witness description: crew members of a B-29 aircraft
